text:
The user parameter modifier uses an XML file to hold values.  It's kind of
clumsy and a pain.  Why not a gui to hold values, and also allow explicit
assignment of values to particular threads (rather than the current round-robin
technique).

Further, these values could be given names to allow users to indicate where they
are to be used similar to the way user-defined variables are used.  

It's possible I'll just make this part of the ThreadGroup GUI to allow users to
create thread-specific values usable throughout the test.  I believe such a
thing would enable everything that the current User Parameter Modifier does
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text: The new User Parameters config element solves these problems.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
